body:
Just thought of a way of sending messages to players ingame regarding matters such as...

  • Invites to a team (with link to teampage)
  • Scrimmage Server Reservation (Schedule and Scrim server no., Server Console will send the message)
  • Tournament Invite (with link)
  • Misc. (Offers, Team Matters, etc.)
The player can use commands such as...

  • /mail [player] [message]
  • /mailread or /checkmail (player can click on any email sent to him)
  • /maildelete (deletes all emails received/read)
Any thoughts about this?
